sentences.sContent: The sick man went into a coma.
sentences.sContent_eng: The sick man went into a coma.

sentences.sContent: In the absence of treatment, disease progression results in seizures, stupour and coma.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the absence of treatment, disease progression results in seizures, stupour and coma.
sentences.sCn: 在不治疗的情况下，病情的发展可导致癫痫发作和昏迷。

sentences.sContent: He has not ventured outside his tiny house for years because his wife is in a coma, and he does not want her to wake up and find him gone.
sentences.sContent_eng: He has not ventured outside his tiny house for years because his wife is in a coma, and he does not want her to wake up and find him gone.
sentences.sCn: 多年来他都没有走出自己的小房子出去冒险，因为他的妻子一直昏迷着，他不希望妻子醒来的时候发现自己已经离开了。

phrases.pCn: 糖尿病性昏睡；糖尿病昏迷症

trans.tranCn: （因严重疾病或重伤引起的）昏迷
